articles.title: Early Amazon Black Friday Garmin deals see Fenix 7 smartwatches get huge savings - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Some great Garmin Black Friday deals on the Fenix 7 smartwatch before Black Friday
articles.content:
There are large discounts on a whole range of Garmin Fenix 7 smartwatches at the Garmin Store on Amazon in the USA and UK, as the retail giant launches its Black Friday sale.
So if you're on the loo… [+1951 chars]

articles.title: As an artist-scientist, 'I'm obsessed with pigments' - Nature.com
articles.description: Biochemist Sierra Weir explores local ecosystems around Pittsburgh for art and inspiration.
